text.2874: [22] ahaasi kummaasa.m mamaanukampayaa {mamaanukampiyaa (pii0 ka0), mamaanukampaaya (syaa0)}, tato cuto  kaalakatomhi devataa..
text.2876: [21] ``tadeva ^a^T0.0134^ea^ kamma.m kusala.m kata.m mayaa, sukha~nca kamma.m  anubhomi attanaa.
text.2877: [22] tayaa hi bhante anukampito bhusa.m, kata~n~nutaaya  abhipaadayaami ta.m..
text.2879: [21] ``sadevake loke samaarake ca, a~n~no muni natthi  tayaanukampako.
text.2880: [22] tayaa hi bhante anukampito bhusa.m, kata~n~nutaaya  abhivaadayaami ta.m..
text.2882: [21] ``imasmi.m ^a^P0.0118^ea^ loke parasmi.m vaa pana,  a~n~no munii natthi tayaanukampako.
text.2883: [22] tayaa hi bhante anukampito bhusa.m, kata~n~nutaaya  abhivaadayaami ta''nti..
text.2897: [22] kuu.taagaaraa ^a^T0.0135^ea^ subhaa rammaa, paasaado te sumaapito..
text.2917: [21] ``dibbaa te vividhaa ruupaa, dibbaa saddaa atho rasaa.
text.2918: [22] gandhaa ca te adhippetaa, pho.t.thabbaa ca manoramaa..
text.2923: [21] ``daanassa te ida.m phala.m, atho siilassa vaa pana.
text.2924: [22] atho a~njalikammassa, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito''..
text.2926: [21] so ^a^T0.0136^ea^ devaputto attamano...pe0... yassa kammassida.m phala.m..
text.2932: [22] so ma.m muduuhi paa.niihi, jaali {jaala (sii0)} tambanakhehi ca..
text.2937: [21] ``ta.m ^a^M0.0111^ea^ me gira.m su.nantassa, haaso me vipulo ahu.
text.2938: [22] udaggacitto sumano, abhisiisi.m {abhisi.msi.m (sii0), abhisiisi (pii0)} tadaa aha.m..
text.2944: [22] mama.m channa~nca ohaaya, anapekkho so apakkami..
text.2950: [22] alattha.m garukaabaadha.m, khippa.m me mara.na.m ahu..
text.2955: [21] ``ya~nca me ahuvaa haaso, sadda.m sutvaana bodhiyaa.
text.2958: [21] ``sace hi bhante gaccheyyaasi, satthu buddhassa santike.
text.2959: [22] mamaapi na.m vacanena, sirasaa vajjaasi vandana.m..
text.2975: [21] ``samassamo natthi kuto panuttaro {uttari (ka0)},  yasena pu~n~nena ca iddhiyaa ca.
text.2976: [27] sabbe ca devaa tidasaga.naa samecca, ta.m ^a^T0.0138^ea^ ta.m namassanti  sasi.mva devaa.
text.2977: [22] imaa ca te accharaayo samantato, naccanti gaayanti  pamodayanti..
text.2980: [22] kenaasi eva.m jalitaanubhaavo, va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa  pabhaasatii''ti..
text.2982: [21] so devaputto attamano...pe0... yassa kammassida.m phala.m..
text.2984: [21] ``aha.m bhadante ahuvaasi pubbe, sumedhanaamassa jinassa  saavako.
text.2985: [22] puthujjano ananubodhohamasmi {anavabodhohamasmi.m (sii0), ananubodhohamaasi.m (?)},  so satta vassaani paribbajissaha.m {pabbajissaha.m (syaa0 ka0), pabbajisaaha.m (pii0)}..
text.2988: [22] ratanuccaya.m hemajaalena channa.m, vanditvaa thuupasmi.m mana.m  pasaadayi.m..
text.2990: [21] ``na ^a^M0.0113^ea^ maasi daana.m na ca matthi daatu.m, pare ca kho  tattha samaadapesi.m.
text.2991: [22] puujetha na.m puujaniiyassa {puujaneyyassa (syaa0 ka0)} dhaatu.m,   eva.m ^a^T0.0139^ea^ kira saggamito gamissatha..
text.2993: [21] ``tadeva kamma.m kusala.m kata.m mayaa, sukha~nca dibba.m  anubhomi attanaa.
text.2994: [22] modaamaha.m tidasaga.nassa majjhe, na tassa pu~n~nassa  khayampi ajjhaga''nti..
text.2999: [22] baahaa paggayha kandasi, vanamajjhe ki.m dukkhito  tuva''nti..
text.3002: [22] tassa cakkayuga.m na vindaami,   tena dukkhena jahaami {jahissa.m (sii0), jahissaami (syaa0 pii0)} jiivita''nti..
text.3004: [21] ``sova.n.namaya.m ma.nimaya.m,   lohitakamaya.m {lohita"ngamaya.m (syaa0), lohita"nkamaya.m (sii0), lohamaya.m (katthaci)} atha ruupiyamaya.m.
text.3005: [22] aacikkha {aacikkhatha (ka0)} me bhaddamaa.nava, cakkayuga.m pa.tipaadayaami te''ti..
text.3007: [21] so ^a^T0.0140^ea^ maa.navo tassa paavadi, ``candimasuuriyaa ubhayettha  dissare.
text.3008: [22] sova.n.namayo ratho mama, tena cakkayugena sobhatii''ti..
text.3010: [21] ``baalo ^a^M0.0114^ea^ kho tva.m asi maa.nava, yo tva.m patthayase  apatthiya.m.
text.3011: [22] ma~n~naami tuva.m marissasi, na hi tva.m lacchasi  candimasuuriye''ti..
text.3014: [22] peto {peto pana (sii0 syaa0)} kaalakato na dissati,   ko nidha kandata.m baalyataro''ti..
text.3016: [21] ``sacca.m kho vadesi maa.nava, ahameva kandata.m baalyataro.
text.3017: [22] canda.m viya daarako ruda.m, peta.m kaalakataabhipatthayi''nti..
text.3020: [22] vaarinaa viya osi~nca.m, sabba.m nibbaapaye dara.m..
text.3022: [21] ``abbahii ^a^T0.0141^ea^ {abbuu.lha (pii0), abbuu.lha.m (syaa0 ka0)} vata me salla.m,   soka.m hadayanissita.m.
text.3026: [22] na socaami na rodaami, vata sutvaana maa.navaati..
text.3028: [21] ``devataa nusi gandhabbo, adu {aadu (sii0 syaa0)} sakko purindado.
text.3029: [22] ko vaa tva.m kassa vaa putto, katha.m jaanemu ta.m maya''nti..
text.3031: [21] ``ya~nca {ya.m (ka0)} kandasi ya~nca rodasi, putta.m aa.laahane saya.m  dahitvaa.
text.3032: [22] svaaha.m kusala.m karitvaa kamma.m, tidasaana.m sahabyata.m  gato''ti {pattoti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.3034: [21] ``appa.m ^a^M0.0115^ea^ vaa bahu.m vaa naaddasaama, daana.m dadantassa sake  agaare.
text.3035: [22] uposathakamma.m vaa {uposathakamma~nca (ka0)} taadisa.m, kena kammena gatosi  devaloka''nti..
text.3038: [22] buddha.m vigataraja.m viti.n.naka"nkha.m, addakkhi.m sugata.m  anomapa~n~na.m..
text.3041: [22] taaha.m kusala.m karitvaana kamma.m, tidasaana.m sahabyata.m  gato''ti..
text.3043: [21] ``acchariya.m vata abbhuta.m vata, a~njalikammassa  ayamiidiso vipaako.
text.3044: [22] ahampi muditamano pasannacitto, ajjeva buddha.m sara.na.m  vajaamii''ti..
text.3046: [21] ``ajjeva buddha.m sara.na.m vajaahi, dhamma~nca sa"ngha~nca  pasannacitto.
text.3047: [22] tatheva sikkhaaya padaani pa~nca, akha.n.daphullaani  samaadiyassu..
text.3050: [22] amajjapo maa ca musaa bha.naahi, sakena daarena ca hohi  tu.t.tho''ti..
text.3053: [22] karomi tuyha.m vacana.m, tva.msi aacariyo mamaati..
text.3059: [22] amajjapo no ca musaa bha.naami, sakena daarena ca homi  tu.t.tho''ti..
text.3063: [21] {pe0 va0 604} su.notha ^a^V0.0084^ea^ ^a^P0.0126^ea^ yakkhassa   ca vaa.nijaana ca, samaagamo yattha tadaa ahosi.
text.3064: [22] yathaa katha.m itaritarena caapi, subhaasita.m ta~nca su.naatha  sabbe..
text.3066: [21] ``yo so ahu raajaa paayaasi naama {naamo (sii0)},  bhummaana.m sahabyagato yasassii.
text.3067: [22] so modamaanova sake vimaane, amaanuso maanuse  ajjhabhaasiiti..
text.3070: [22] suduggame va.n.nupathassa majjhe, va"nka.m bhayaa {dha"nka.mbhayaa (ka0)} na.t.thamanaa manussaa..
text.3072: [21] ``nayidha phalaa muulamayaa ca santi, upaadaana.m natthi kutodha bhakkho.
text.3073: [22] a~n~natra pa.msuuhi ca vaalukaahi ca, tataahi ^a^T0.0144^ea^ u.nhaahi ca daaru.naahi ca..
text.3078: [21] ``atha ^a^M0.0117^ea^ tumhe kena {kena nu (syaa0 ka0)} va.n.nena,   kimaasamaanaa ima.m padesa.m hi.
text.3079: [22] anupavi.t.thaa sahasaa samecca, lobhaa bhayaa atha vaa  sampamuu.lhaa''ti..
text.3081: [21] ``magadhesu a"ngesu ca satthavaahaa, aaropayitvaa pa.niya.m  puthutta.m.
text.3082: [22] te yaamase sindhusoviirabhuumi.m, dhanatthikaa uddaya.m  patthayaanaa..
text.3085: [22] etena vegena aayaama sabbe {sabbe te (ka0)}, ratti.m magga.m pa.tipannaa  vikaale..
text.3088: [22] suduggame ^a^T0.0145^ea^ va.n.nupathassa majjhe, disa.m na jaanaama  pamuu.lhacittaa..
text.3091: [22] tatuttari.m jiivitamaasamaanaa, disvaa patiitaa sumanaa  udaggaa''ti..
text.3093: [21] ``paara.m samuddassa ima~nca va.n.nu.m {vana.m (syaa0), va.n.na.m (ka0)},  vettaacara.m {vetta.m para.m (syaa0), vettaacaara.m (ka0)} sa"nkupatha~nca magga.m.
text.3094: [22] nadiyo pana pabbataana~nca duggaa, puthuddisaa gacchatha  bhogahetu..
text.3097: [22] ya.m vo suta.m vaa atha vaapi di.t.tha.m, accheraka.m ta.m vo  su.noma taataa''ti..
text.3099: [21] ``itopi ^a^M0.0118^ea^ accheratara.m kumaara, na to suta.m vaa atha  vaapi di.t.tha.m.
text.3103: [22] dumaa cime {dumaa ca te (syaa0 ka0)} niccaphaluupapannaa,   atiiva gandhaa surabhi.m pavaayanti..
text.3112: [22] da.lho ca vaggu ca susa"ngato ca {vaggu sumukho susa"ngato (sii0)},  atiiva nijjhaanakhamo manu~n~no..
text.3118: [22] acintiyo sabbagu.nuupapanno, raajaa yathaa vessava.no  na.linyaa {na.li~n~na.m (ka0)}..
text.3120: [21] ``devo ^a^M0.0119^ea^ nu aasi udavaasi yakkho, udaahu devindo  manussabhuuto.
text.3121: [22] pucchanti ta.m vaa.nijaa satthavaahaa, aacikkha ko naama  tuva.msi yakkho''ti..
text.3123: [21] ``seriisako {serissako (sii0 syaa0)} naama ahamhi yakkho,   kantaariyo va.n.nupathamhi gutto.
text.3124: [22] ima.m padesa.m abhipaalayaami, vacanakaro vessava.nassa  ra~n~no''ti..
text.3126: [21] ``adhiccaladdha.m pari.naamaja.m te, saya.m kata.m udaahu devehi  dinna.m.
text.3127: [22] pucchanti ta.m vaa.nijaa satthavaahaa, katha.m tayaa laddhamida.m  manu~n~na''nti..
text.3129: [21] ``naadhiccaladdha.m na pari.naamaja.m me, na saya.m kata.m na hi  devehi dinna.m.
text.3130: [22] sakehi kammehi apaapakehi, pu~n~nehi ^a^T0.0148^ea^ me laddhamida.m  manu~n~na''nti..
text.3132: [21] ``ki.m te vata.m ki.m pana brahmacariya.m, kissa suci.n.nassa  aya.m vipaako.
text.3133: [22] pucchanti ta.m vaa.nijaa satthavaahaa, katha.m tayaa laddhamida.m  vimaana''nti..
text.3135: [21] ``mama.m paayaasiiti ahu sama~n~naa, rajja.m yadaa kaarayi.m  kosalaana.m.
text.3136: [22] natthikadi.t.thi kadariyo paapadhammo, ucchedavaadii ca tadaa  ahosi.m..
text.3138: [21] ``sama.no ca kho aasi kumaarakassapo, bahussuto  cittakathii u.laaro.
text.3139: [22] so me tadaa dhammakatha.m abhaasi {akaasi (sii0)},  di.t.thivisuukaani vinodayii me..
text.3142: [27] paa.naatipaataa virato ahosi.m, loke adinna.m  parivajjayissa.m.
text.3143: [22] amajjapo ^a^P0.0129^ea^ no ca musaa abhaa.ni.m, sakena  daarena ca ahosi tu.t.tho..
text.3145: [21] ``ta.m ^a^T0.0149^ea^ me vata.m ta.m pana brahmacariya.m, tassa suci.n.nassa  aya.m vipaako.
text.3146: [22] teheva kammehi apaapakehi, pu~n~nehi me laddhamida.m  vimaana''nti..
text.3148: [21] ``sacca.m ^a^V0.0086^ea^ kiraaha.msu naraa sapa~n~naa, ana~n~nathaa vacana.m  pa.n.ditaana.m.
text.3149: [22] yahi.m yahi.m gacchati pu~n~nakammo, tahi.m tahi.m modati  kaamakaamii..
text.3151: [21] ``yahi.m yahi.m sokapariddavo ca, vadho ca bandho ca  parikkileso.
text.3152: [22] tahi.m tahi.m gacchati paapakammo, na muccati duggatiyaa  kadaacii''ti..
text.3155: [22] janassimassa tuyha~nca kumaara, appaccayo kena nu kho  ahosii''ti..
text.3157: [21] ``ime ca siriisavanaa {ime siriisuupavanaa ca (sii0), imepi  siriisavanaa ca (pii0 ka0)} taataa, dibbaa {dibbaa ca (pii0 ka0)} gandhaa surabhii {surabhi.m  (sii0 ka0)} sampavanti {sampavaayanti (ka0)}.
text.3158: [22] te sampavaayanti ima.m vimaana.m, divaa ^a^T0.0150^ea^ ca ratto ca tama.m  nihantvaa..
text.3161: [22] maanussaka.m vassasata.m atiita.m, yadagge kaayamhi idhuupapanno..
text.3164: [22] aayukkhayaa pu~n~nakkhayaa cavissa.m, teneva sokena  pamucchitosmii''ti {samucchitosmiiti (pii0 ka0)}..
text.3166: [21] ``katha.m nu soceyya tathaavidho so, laddhaa vimaana.m  atula.m ciraaya.
text.3167: [22] ye caapi kho ittaramupapannaa, te nuuna soceyyu.m  parittapu~n~naa''ti..
text.3169: [21] ``anucchavi.m ovadiya~nca me ta.m, ya.m ma.m tumhe peyyavaaca.m  vadetha.
text.3170: [22] tumhe ca kho taataa mayaanuguttaa, yenicchaka.m tena paletha  sotthi''nti..
text.3175: [21] ``maa ceva seriisamaha.m akattha, sabba~nca vo bhavissati  ya.m vadetha.
text.3179: [22] saddho ca caagii ca supesalo ca, vicakkha.no  santusito mutiimaa..
text.3181: [21] ``sa~njaanamaano ^a^M0.0122^ea^ na musaa bha.neyya, paruupaghaataaya na  cetayeyya.
text.3182: [22] vebhuutika.m pesu.na.m no kareyya, sa.nha~nca vaaca.m sakhila.m  bha.neyya..
text.3185: [22] so maatara.m pitara~ncaapi jantu, dhammena poseti  ariyavutti..
text.3187: [21] ``ma~n~ne so maataapituuna.m kaara.naa, bhogaani pariyesati  na attahetu.
text.3188: [22] maataapituuna~nca yo {so (?)} accayena, nekkhammapo.no ^a^T0.0152^ea^ carissati brahmacariya.m..
text.3190: [21] ``ujuu ava"nko asa.tho amaayo, na lesakappena ca  vohareyya.
text.3191: [22] so taadiso sukatakammakaarii, dhamme .thito kinti  labhetha dukkha.m..
text.3193: [21] ``ta.m ^a^V0.0087^ea^ kaara.naa paatukatomhi attanaa, tasmaa dhamma.m passatha  vaa.nijaase.
text.3194: [27] a~n~natra teniha bhasmii {bhasmi (syaa0), bhasma (ka0)} bhavetha, andhaakulaa vippana.t.thaa ara~n~ne.
text.3195: [22] ta.m khippamaanena lahu.m parena, sukho have sappurisena  sa"ngamo''ti..
text.3198: [27] ki.m naamadheyya.m ki.m pana tassa gotta.m.
text.3199: [26] mayampi na.m da.t.thukaamamha yakkha, yassaanukampaaya  idhaagatosi.
text.3200: [22] laabhaa hi tassa, yassa tuva.m pihesii''ti..
text.3205: [22] maa ^a^T0.0153^ea^ kho na.m hii.littha supesalo so''ti..
text.3208: [27] na kho na.m jaanaama sa edisoti.
text.3222: [21] te ^a^T0.0154^ea^ tattha sabbeva `aha.m pure'ti, upaasakatta.m pa.tivedayi.msu.
text.3223: [27] paa.naatipaataa virataa ahesu.m, loke adinna.m parivajjayi.msu.
text.3224: [22] amajjapaa no ca musaa bha.ni.msu, sakena daarena ca ahesu.m  tu.t.thaa..
text.3226: [21] te tattha sabbeva `aha.m pure'ti, upaasakatta.m pa.tivedayitvaa.
text.3227: [22] pakkaami sattho anumodamaano, yakkhiddhiyaa anumato  punappuna.m..
text.3229: [21] ``gantvaana ^a^M0.0124^ea^ te sindhusoviirabhuumi.m,   dhanatthikaa uddaya.m {udaya (pii0 ka0)} patthayaanaa.
text.3246: [22] kuu.taagaaraa ^a^T0.0155^ea^ sattasataa u.laaraa, ve.luriyathambhaa rucakatthataa  subhaa..
text.3248: [21] ``tatthacchasi pivasi khaadasi ca, dibbaa ca vii.naa  pavadanti vaggu.m.
text.3249: [22] dibbaa rasaa kaamagu.nettha pa~nca, naariyo ca naccanti  suva.n.nachannaa..
text.3251: [21] ``kena tetaadiso va.n.no, kena te idha mijjhati.
text.3252: [22] uppajjanti ca te bhogaa, ye keci manaso piyaa..
text.3255: [22] kenaasi eva.m jalitaanubhaavo, va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa  pabhaasatii''ti..
text.3258: [22] pa~nha.m pu.t.tho viyaakaasi, yassa kammassida.m phala.m..
text.3261: [22] mahiddhiko camhi mahaanubhaavo, dibbehi kaamehi  sama"ngibhuuto..
